page.title: 11Tourism
page.content: People visit Southport because of the attractions such as the Flower Show, Model Village and for the entertainments. Another attraction is the beach, although the sea does'nt come in very far, but people come for the fresh air. Another one of Southport's features is Lord Street one of the best for shopping in Britain. There are lots of leisure activities for all generations, and in the town centre there are lots of interesting and different shops. People come to Southport and holidays, these people are called 'tourists'. Recently there was a brand new ride in the fairground called, 'The Looping Star', which has added to Southport's crowd pulling facilities.
